definitions: relating to a line of hereditary rulers of a country

examples.text: the last dynastic rulers of Rome

shortDefinitions: relating to line of hereditary rulers of country

definitions: relating to a succession of people from the same family who play a prominent role in business, politics, or another field

examples.text: the plot concerns the dynastic struggles of two brothers

shortDefinitions: relating to succession of people from same family who play prominent role in business
